title: A Ghost Waits
review: This has some cute dialogue, but the performances are so awkward that I can't say I enjoyed it very much. It's a low budget black and white romantic comedy about a man and a ghost. It's not funny or scary, and the romance element was the most successful part, but if you actually want to see a rom-com then there are countless better choices out there. I liked the design of the poster and the font they chose.
